funding-group.funding-statement: This work expands and builds upon doctoral work that was funded by the National Institute of Nursing Research ( https://www.ninr.nih.gov/) F31NR013135 (Knopf). The authors wish to acknowledge financial support from the National Institute of Nursing Research ( https://www.ninr.nih.gov/) T32NR007066 (Knopf, Carter-Harris) and F31NR013864 (Al-Khattab), and the Indiana University Clinical and Translational Sciences Institute ( https://www.indianactsi.org/) KL2TR001106 and UL1TR001108 (Oruche). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
